In the end<S>1161</S> <S>3796</S> of the sabbath<S>4521</S>, as it began to dawn<S>2020</S> toward<S>1519</S> the first<S>3391</S> day of the week<S>4521</S>, came<S>2064</S> Mary<S>3137</S> Magdalene<S>3094</S> and<S>2532</S> the other<S>243</S> Mary<S>3137</S> to see<S>2334</S> the sepulchre<S>5028</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, there was<S>1096</S> a great<S>3173</S> earthquake<S>4578</S>: for<S>1063</S> the angel<S>32</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> descended<S>2597</S> from<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S>, and came<S>4334</S> and rolled back<S>617</S> the stone<S>3037</S> from<S>575</S> the door<S>2374</S>, and<S>2532</S> sat<S>2521</S> upon<S>1883</S> it<S>846</S>. <sup>was: or, had been</sup>
<S>1161</S> His<S>846</S> countenance<S>2397</S> was<S>2258</S> like<S>5613</S> lightning<S>796</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> raiment<S>1742</S> white<S>3022</S> as<S>5616</S> snow<S>5510</S>:
And<S>1161</S> for<S>575</S> fear<S>5401</S> of him<S>846</S> the keepers<S>5083</S> did shake<S>4579</S>, and<S>2532</S> became<S>1096</S> as<S>5616</S> dead<S>3498</S> men.
And<S>1161</S> the angel<S>32</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto the women<S>1135</S>, Fear<S>5399</S> not<S>3361</S> ye<S>5210</S>: for<S>1063</S> I know<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S> ye seek<S>2212</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, which<S>3588</S> was crucified<S>4717</S>.
He is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> here<S>5602</S>: for<S>1063</S> he is risen<S>1453</S>, as<S>2531</S> he said<S>2036</S>. Come<S>1205</S>, see<S>1492</S> the place<S>5117</S> where<S>3699</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> lay<S>2749</S>.
And<S>2532</S> go<S>4198</S> quickly<S>5035</S>, and tell<S>2036</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> that<S>3754</S> he is risen<S>1453</S> from<S>575</S> the dead<S>3498</S>; and<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, he goeth before<S>4254</S> you<S>5209</S> into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>; there<S>1563</S> shall ye see<S>3700</S> him<S>846</S>: lo<S>2400</S>, I have told<S>2036</S> you<S>5213</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they departed<S>1831</S> quickly<S>5035</S> from<S>575</S> the sepulchre<S>3419</S> with<S>3326</S> fear<S>5401</S> and<S>2532</S> great<S>3173</S> joy<S>5479</S>; and did run<S>5143</S> to bring<S>518</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> word<S>518</S>.
And<S>1161</S> as<S>5613</S> they went<S>4198</S> to tell<S>518</S> his<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S>,<S>2532</S> behold<S>2400</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> met<S>528</S> them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, All hail<S>5463</S>. And<S>1161</S> they came<S>4334</S> and held<S>2902</S> him<S>846</S> by the feet<S>4228</S>, and<S>2532</S> worshipped<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>.
Then<S>5119</S> said<S>3004</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto them<S>846</S>, Be<S>5399</S> not<S>3361</S> afraid<S>5399</S>: go<S>565</S> tell<S>518</S> my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S> that<S>2443</S> they go<S>5217</S> into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, and there<S>2546</S> shall they see<S>3700</S> me<S>3165</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> when they<S>846</S> were going<S>4198</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, some<S>5100</S> of the watch<S>2892</S> came<S>2064</S> into<S>1519</S> the city<S>4172</S>, and shewed<S>518</S> unto the chief priests<S>749</S> all the things<S>537</S> that were done<S>1096</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when they were assembled<S>4863</S> with<S>3326</S> the elders<S>4245</S>, and<S>5037</S> had taken<S>2983</S> counsel<S>4824</S>, they gave<S>1325</S> large<S>2425</S> money<S>694</S> unto the soldiers<S>4757</S>,
Saying<S>3004</S>, Say ye<S>2036</S>,<S>3754</S> His<S>846</S> disciples<S>3101</S> came<S>2064</S> by night<S>3571</S>, and stole<S>2813</S> him<S>846</S> away while we<S>2257</S> slept<S>2837</S>.
And<S>2532</S> if<S>1437</S> this<S>5124</S> come<S>191</S> to<S>1909</S> the governor's<S>2232</S> ears<S>191</S>, we<S>2249</S> will persuade<S>3982</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> secure<S>275</S> <S>4160</S> you<S>5209</S>.
So<S>1161</S> they took<S>2983</S> the money<S>694</S>, and did<S>4160</S> as<S>5613</S> they were taught<S>1321</S>: and<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> saying<S>3056</S> is commonly reported<S>1310</S> among<S>3844</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> until<S>3360</S> this day<S>4594</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> the eleven<S>1733</S> disciples<S>3101</S> went away<S>4198</S> into<S>1519</S> Galilee<S>1056</S>, into<S>1519</S> a mountain<S>3735</S> where<S>3757</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> had appointed<S>5021</S> them<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when they saw<S>1492</S> him<S>846</S>, they worshipped<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>: but<S>1161</S> some doubted<S>1365</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> came<S>4334</S> and spake<S>2980</S> unto them<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, All<S>3956</S> power<S>1849</S> is given<S>1325</S> unto me<S>3427</S> in<S>1722</S> heaven<S>3772</S> and<S>2532</S> in<S>1909</S> earth<S>1093</S>.
Go ye<S>4198</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, and teach<S>3100</S> all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S>, baptizing<S>907</S> them<S>846</S> in<S>1519</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the Son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>: <sup>teach: or, make disciples, or, Christians of all nations</sup>
Teaching<S>1321</S> them<S>846</S> to observe<S>5083</S> all things<S>3956</S> whatsoever<S>3745</S> I have commanded<S>1781</S> you<S>5213</S>: and<S>2532</S>, lo<S>2400</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S> alway<S>3956</S> <S>2250</S>, even unto<S>2193</S> the end<S>4930</S> of the world<S>165</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
